main event: A bright white oval object was observed approaching rapidly over Baghdad, Iraq, before disappearing in a burst of fragments.
interesting points: The object approached low above the horizon and was bright white., The sighting lasted about 3-5 seconds., The observer was a military personnel with previous experience of seeing shooting stars., It was noted that the object did not exhibit a tail., Weather conditions were clear at the time of the sighting.
sighted object: one small oval bright white object
witness description: observer was likely a military personnel with experience in aerial observations
